Articles.Content: I like to play ksp stock, and ksp with mods, to do that though i have to copy the entire game and separate things like that. Can squad please add specific modding?
Probably not, as it wouldn't make much sense. The game loads everything into memory at the very beginning. I think you wouldn't want to play your stock save with the performance of 150-mods save.

8 hours ago, The Aziz said:

Probably not, as it wouldn't make much sense. The game loads everything into memory at the very beginning. I think you wouldn't want to play your stock save with the performance of 150-mods save.

Yeah good point. I just feel there ought to be a better way than whats there now.

Some games (Civ V and VI for instance) have a mod loader interface on the main menu where you can pick the mods you want to load from a list, or automatically load the mods used in a save file. KSP should be able to do that easily enough.
